MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L34 Prescot area of Liverpool affecting properties in Liverpool Road, Beesley Road, Wood Lane, Manchester Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 8:36am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:40am on 2nd March 2021
